sen.j: 仁政方（じんせいがた）とは、室町幕府初期に設置された機関の1つである。
sen.e: Jinseigata was one of the institutions established in the early Muromachi bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun).

sen.j: 引付衆が下した訴訟判決に対する救済措置を行う越訴機関と推定されている。
sen.e: It is presumed to have been an institution that addressed a direct appeal to a senior official without going through the normal formalities as a relief measure against a judicial decision made by Hikitsukeshu (Coadjustor of the High Court).
